Description: Russia's average daily military personell losses are now exceeding 3x the average from the same period in 2022 and 2.5x compared to 2023.According to British intelligence, in September, Russia suffered the highest average daily losses of the war at 1,271 soldiers killed or wounded every 24 hours.This exceeds the previous peak of 1,262 daily losses recorded in May 2024.
